footer.about_text: BoliOptics sells professional, high quality microscopes, microscope accessories, and magnifying lamps. We supply research laboratories, medical centers, universities, industrial manufactures, factories, students, and hobbyists world wide. Our parts and accessories are compatible with Leica, Olympus, Nikon, and Zeiss.

redeem.heading: Redeem Gift Certificate
redeem.intro: To redeem a gift certificate at {store_name}, follow the simple steps below.
redeem.item1: You need your unique gift certificate code, which is part of the gift certificate that was emailed to you as an attachment. It will look something like Z50-Y6K-COS-402.
redeem.item2: Browse the store and add items to your shopping cart as you normally would.
redeem.item3: Click the 'View Cart' link to view the contents of your shopping cart.
redeem.item4: Type your gift certificate code in to the 'Redeem Gift Certificate' box and click 'Go'.

balance.heading: Check Gift Certificate Balance
balance.intro: You can check the balance of a gift certificate by typing the code in to the box below.

created.heading: Your account has been created

rss.intro: RSS feeds are used for syndicating regularly changing content on a web site, including this one. You can open an RSS feed using an RSS reader and use it to see if there is any new content on this site or you can set up a server-side script to parse the feed and display it on your web site.

search.intro1: Product search feeds allow you to save your custom product searches as syndication feed that will always update when there are new results.
search.intro2: To create a product search feed, perform a standard search on {store} and at the bottom of the page click on one of the syndication options.

herecomestheinvite.productpage_textblock: PUT YOUR CUSTOM 2ND BANNER HERE:

banner_1.title: Shop with Confidence
banner_1.text: We provide the highest quality microscopes at best prices online. Our products undergo strict quality control. We provide a 30 day inspection period.

banner_2.title: Unparalleled Customer Service
banner_2.text: You will always reach a live person when you call. We respond to your inquries within 24 hours. We offer same day shipping and fully support international customers.

banner_3.title: Industry Experts Since 1994
banner_3.text: We design and manufacture microscope and optical equipment. Our engineers and customer service staff can provide technical support for every product.

banner_4.title: We Build Custom Solutions
banner_4.text: We have our own factories, and our warehouses are in California, USA. If you need specific features, we will work with you to build custom microscope solutions for your application.

free_shipping_return.heading: Designed for your application
free_shipping_return.text: We can help you choose the right microscope system and customize products. Contact us: sales@bolioptics.com or 909-931-3626

testimonials.heading: Customer Reviews
testimonials.text_1: I purchased a XY Gliding Table (Manual Stage for Microscopes, Solid Platform Dimensions 380x230mm) from BoliOptics about a month ago and have been using it since I received it. The product has excellent quality and meets my need perfectly. Their after-sale service on the product is excellent too. They responded to my inquiries very quickly and helped me resolved a minor technical question within a few hours. Their CEO, Mary Zhang, was also involved in the quick response to my inquiry.
testimonials.text_2: Two significant orders and this team doesn't miss a beat.  Great prices, excellent microbiology, stereoscopes and microelectronics scoping equipment.  But the attention to customer service has been the real catch for me.  I have bought plenty of microscope equipment in the past for various needs, and I have to say, these guys should be heavily considered in your next small or large order regardless of who you've used in the past...
testimonials.text_3: Mary and her team were amazingly helpful. We were in need of a specific model for our application. After contacting Mary and her team, we were told they had these in stock, and we were invited to come see the microscope in her showroom. Once we arrived, the microscope was already set up for us! Amazing attention to detail and excellent customer service.
testimonials.text_4: Excellent in service, great price. I have worked with many vendors, Boli is among the top best few.
testimonials.text_5: I have found BoliOptics of great assistance to Middle/High School teachers and donors to best select the proper instrumentation, consider interface options, and provide technical guidance or suggestions to get the most information to make an informed solution. Mary Zhang, CEO, gets involved when needed to provide oversight for system selection.
